participant_1.background:
I love Asian food, especially spicy Thai food.
i am still single at the age of 35.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
i m saving up to buy a new camera.

participant_2.background:
I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family.
i enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.
I met my family through the military.
i prefer headsets over earbuds.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to keep up with the news and learn about political issues.
That's really interesting! What do you like most about it?
I like learning about different perspectives and how people come to different conclusions.
I see. That makes sense. I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
That's great! I'm glad you have found something that helps you relax.
Thanks! I also like to cook. What are some of your favorite foods?
I love Asian food, especially spicy Thai food.
Oh, that's awesome! I love Thai food too. What's your favorite dish?
I love pad thai! It's so delicious.
Me too! I love the noodles and the peanut sauce.
Yeah, it's so good.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
Oh, that's awesome! I love animals.
Me too! They're so much fun to have around.
I agree! They make great companions.
Yeah, they really do.
It was nice talking to you!
You too
